summary: Betty Grable and Dan Dailey are a married song and dance team who cannot have children. The movie follows the travails as they try and adopt and keep the kids they adopt while performing on their TV show.
cast: Betty Grable|Dan Dailey|David Wayne|Jane Wyatt|Mitzi Gaynor|Una Merkel|Don Hicks|Louise Beavers|Laura Pierpont|Harry Seymour|Robert R. Stephenson|Bill Baldwin|Jackie Barnett|Beth Belden|Georgie Billings|Conrad Binyon|Vicki Lee Blunt|Eileen Boyer|William Bryant|Anne Burr|John Burton|Harry Carter|Melinda Casey|Frances Charles|Phyllis Coates|Billy Daniel|Danny Davenport|Sayre Dearing|Elinor Donahue|Calvin Emery|Charles Ferguson|Bess Flowers|Sally Forrest|Irving Fulton|Jeanne Gail|Alex Gerry|Eula Guy|Lois Hall|Sherry Hall|Sam Harris|Myron Healey|John Hedloe|Thomas Browne Henry|Marjorie Holliday|Clark Howat|Johnnie Jallings|Larry Keating|Billy Lechner|Frederick Lewis|Lee MacGregor|Mae Marsh|Marion Marshall|Robert McCord|Bill McKenzie|Harold Miller|Bob Milton|Dorothy Neumann|Gary Pagett|Beulah Parkington|Barbara Pepper|James Pierce|Buddy Prior|Daphne Purnell|Edwin Rand|Frank Remley|Noel Reyburn|Yvette Reynard|Suzanne Ridgway|Tim Ryan|Bobby Stevens|Tom Stevenson|Minerva Urecal|Isabel Withers|Wilson Wood|Charles Woolf
title: My Blue Heaven
